title: Collection Manifest
description: Schema for hve-core Copilot CLI plugin collection manifests

id.description: Unique identifier for the collection. Lowercase, hyphens only.

description.description: Brief description of the collection purpose.

maturity.description: Optional release channel eligibility. Defaults to stable when omitted. Experimental collections are excluded from Stable (Release) channel.

tags.description: Discovery tags for filtering and search.

path.description: Relative path from repo root to the source file.

usage.description: Optional usage guidance for the item.

maturity.description: Optional release maturity for this item. Defaults to stable when omitted.

displayName.description: VS Code Marketplace display name. Used as the extension title when the collection is packaged standalone.

categories.description: VS Code Marketplace categories for the standalone extension package.

keywords.description: VS Code Marketplace keywords for the standalone extension package. Maximum 5 items per Marketplace rules.
